item.title: Crew Compartment Overhead Hatch Latch Pins

remarks.para: One may be removed provided hatch is operative.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to or below Crew compartment overhead hatch: "LATCH PIN REMOVED". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Remove the crew compartment overhead hatch (AMM 52-21-01).
Using the applicable steps of 747 Overhaul Manual, 52-22-11, remove the broken or cracked latch pin assembly.
Replace the latch pin assembly with washer(s) the same diameter as Part No. 63-1658 and equal in thickness to the rack gear on the latch pin assembly.
Reassemble the door mechanism using the applicable steps of 747 Overhaul Manual, 52-22-11.
Reinstall the crew compartment overhead hatch (AMM 52-21-01).

note.para: With a missing latch pin with the extend stop collar, be careful not to over-rotate the door handle when securing the door closed. When closing the door, do not rotate the outside handle past the hatch skin cutout or the interior handle past the closed guide markings.
